text:
Annual % target / base year: report on the average annual emission reduction figure
achieved so far by using the following formula:
𝑒𝑚𝑖𝑠𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛𝑠 𝑖𝑛 𝑡𝑎𝑟𝑔𝑒𝑡 𝑦𝑒𝑎𝑟
1−
𝑝𝑒𝑟𝑐𝑒𝑛𝑡𝑎𝑔𝑒 𝑎𝑣𝑒𝑟𝑎𝑔𝑒 𝑎𝑛𝑛𝑢𝑎𝑙 𝑒𝑚𝑖𝑠𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛 𝑟𝑒𝑑𝑢𝑐𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 = 𝑒𝑚𝑖𝑠𝑠𝑖𝑜𝑛𝑠 𝑖𝑛 𝑡𝑎𝑟𝑔𝑒𝑡 𝑏𝑎𝑠𝑒 𝑦𝑒𝑎𝑟 .
𝑡𝑎𝑟𝑔𝑒𝑡 𝑦𝑒𝑎𝑟−𝑏𝑎𝑠𝑒 𝑦𝑒𝑎𝑟
Question ID 535 – Emission trading schemes
Release date
July 2024
Question asked
Is there a clear definition or exhaustive list of ‘regulated Emission Trading Schemes’?
ESRS reference
ESRS E1 paragraphs 48 (b) and AR 44
Key terms
